Title: Laplacian ow for closed G2 structures: Real analyticity
Abstract: © 2019 International Press of Boston, Inc.. All rights reserved.Let '(t); t 2 [0; T0] be a solution to the Laplacian ow for closed G2 structures on a compact 7-manifold M. We show that for each fixed time t 2 (0; T0], (M; '(t); g(t)) is real analytic, where g(t) is the metric induced by '(t). Consequently, any Laplacian soliton is real analytic and we obtain unique continuation results for the flow.
